column1: Uchi////i had to wait a fortnight before writing this review
column2: just to be sure i was being fair.  guys
column3: this place is simply not worth it as it stands right now
column4: but im gonna give it 3 stars because of the effort.  i really do believe they are trying very hard to be as good as they can.  if they improve the food they have the potential to be a 5 star.  for reference
column5: we went in on a random monday at 5:15pm
